summary: an imperial standalone female companion found in dawnstar
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][center][color=#980000][size=4][b]update: version 0.3 is out. i just finished working on it.[/b][/size][/color]
-
[i][size=3]what is this:[/size][/i]
this is a standalone marriageable follower based off of an imperial female [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82800/?]preset[/url] i made in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]racemenu[/url] by expired. it has been checked with tes5edit.
[img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/51cef914ef474923aab9ac65bf4fecde.png[/img]
-
[i][size=3]description:[/size][/i]
she's located in the large bedroom in windpeak inn, dawnstar. her weight is at 75, and uses the femalecondescending voice.
the lore behind her being op-ish is at the very bottom if you feel like reading it lol.
please take screenshots or videos and upload them! thank you. (my intel hd graphics cry when i take photos like the ones shown)
-
[i][size=3]requirements:
[/size][/i]skyrim.esm
-
[i][size=3]installation:
[/size][/i]if using a mod manager, simply double click to install. (that's nmm idk about mo lol)
please view the manual installation text file under the optional files.
-
[i][size=3]uninstallation:
[/size][/i]if using a mod manager, simply double click to uninstall. (again, nmm...)
please view the manual installation text file under the optional files. (it contains the uninstallation too XDXDXD)
-
[size=3][i]known bugs:
[/i][/size]she looks a little weird lol
-

(also textures credits: Real Girls Realistic body texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase by Zonzai and Seren4XX, Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE (Beta) by drunkenmojo Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa)
-
[i][size=3]lore:[/size][/i]
Two teenagers decided to run away from their families and start a new one. The female, who was a Breton mage that enjoyed robbing people, met the attractive noble male while on her way to Solitude. Briefly after meeting, they fell in love and they decided to run away together (not really the woman because she's kinda homeless lol). Settling in Dawnstar, the father worked as a miner while his pregnant wife stayed at home. Soon after giving birth to twin girls, the mother died. Yadda yadda yadda the eldest was very gifted in magical arts while the other grew up to be a great archer. The father died by committing sewerside (death by mining into sewer pipe). The twins were sad, obviously, and they decided to take their anger out on the dead in dungeons. They found daedric weapons and enough gold to buy armor, but the youngest decided to run away with all the gold. The oldest, Pynna, resides in the Windpeak Inn, simply waiting for her little sister to return home.[/center][center]
tl;dr nobleman and mage have twin girls, both die, girls become rich, younger runs away.
-[/center][/font]
author: annanana and various authors
